Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-14017 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.21.4-21
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-14017 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.21.4-21. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package cmake is earlier than 3.21.4-21, affected by CVE-2025-14017
